renameFile

public static boolean renameFile(java.io.File file,
                                 java.lang.String newName,
                                 boolean keepExtension)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

Renames a file

Parameters:
file - file that is to be renamed
newName - new name for the file
keepExtension - if true, file extension will be appended to new name, if there was any.
Returns:
true, if operation was successful, false otherwise
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

getNewFileName

public static java.lang.String getNewFileName(java.io.File file,
                                              java.lang.String newName)

Given a File named "hans.txt". newName is "peter". Returning String will be "peter.txt".

Original name is "hans.txt.tex". newName is "peter". Returning String will be "peter.tex".

Original name is "hans.txt.tex". newName is "peter.txt". Returning String will be "peter.txt.tex".

Parameters:
file - File, for which new name is wanted.
newName - the new filename discarding extension.
Returns:
the new filename including extension.
